name: Employee Directory
description: The app enables one to view non-sensitive data about other employees. The app enables us to filter employees by name and sort employees by first name, last name, department or years worked.

name: Workout Logger
description: Workout tracker app helps one to view, create and track daily workouts. The user can log multiple exercises in a workout on a given day.

name: Code Query
description: 'Cody Query' is an application that allows bootcamp students to ask and manage questions and answers. The users connected can communicate in real-time.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: 'Eat-Da-Burger' is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Each burger in the waiting area also has a 'Devour it!' button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page indicating it is devoured!

name: Employee Manager
description: 'Employee-tracker' is a command line application that lets one to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees in a company.

name: Weather App
description: The weather application comes with search functionality to find current weather conditions and the future weather outlook for multiple cities.

name: Readme generator
description: 'Readme-generator' application comes handy for users to create readme file for the repositories.
